## Trip Reports

Outside of my job as a data scientist, I am an avid rock & alpine climber. I've climbed in 12 US states as well as in Mexico, tallying over 1,000 pitches since I began outdoor climbing. Below, I've compiled a list of my best trip reports below, some of which are unpublished.
